wikipedia_page.main:
Clive Wedderburn (born 10 January 1967) is an English actor best known for his role as Police Constable Gary McCann in The Bill.He was born in Reading, Berkshire in 1967. In 1972 his parents moved to Birmingham, where he was to spend the next 13 years before moving to London to train as an actor at East 15 Acting School. He went on to enjoy a colourful acting career, performing on stage at the Royal National Theatre and the Royal Court Theatre. 
He acted in the short-lived Silver Street, a daily radio soap broadcast on BBC Asian Network.
